Micropython Projects¶

The following are interesting and practical projects of Pico-4wd. We describe the implementation effect and flowchart of this example in each chapter.

You can run these projects separately first to fully experience the fun of Pico-4wd.

If you want to understand the internal programming principles, you can combine flowchart of this example and the API file.

Welcome to modify according to your own ideas and share with us.

  • Don’t Push Me
  • Line Track
  • Bull Fight
  • Obstacle Avoid

..example_app_control
